People's Daily People's Daily full text RSS. Get more full text RSS: https://feedx.net http://www.people.com.cn/ 01版要闻 - 习近平同赞比亚总统希奇莱马会谈http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-09/16/nw.D110000renmrb_20230916_1-01.htm
;Saturday, September 16, 2023
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;The morning of September 15th , President Xi Jinping held talks at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing with President Hichilema of Zambia, who was in China for a state visit. This is a group photo of Xi Jinping and his wife Peng Liyuan with Hichilema and his wife Mutinta before the talks.
;Photo by Xinhua News Agency reporter Huang Jingwen

;
; ;;;;; ; ;;;
;;
;

;On the morning of September 15, President Xi Jinping held talks at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing with President Hichilema of Zambia, who was in China for a state visit. Before the talks, Xi Jinping held a welcoming ceremony for Hichilema at the square outside the east gate of the Great Hall of the People.
;Photo by Xinhua News Agency reporter Pang Xinglei

;
; ;

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, September 15th   (Reporter Zheng Mingda) On the morning of September 15, President Xi Jinping held talks at the Great Hall of the People with President Hichilema of Zambia, who was in China for a state visit. The two heads of state announced that they would upgrade China-Zambia relations to a comprehensive strategic cooperative partnership.

;

;Xi Jinping pointed out that the traditional friendship between China and Zambia was forged by the older generation leaders of the two countries and has withstood the test of changing international situations. The Tanzania-Zambia Railway is a symbol of China-Africa friendship, and the people of the two countries have special friendship with each other. China has always viewed and developed China-Zambia relations from a strategic and long-term perspective, and is willing to work with Zambia to transform the deep traditional friendship between the two countries into an inexhaustible driving force for win-win cooperation in the new era, so as to promote the stability and long-term development of China-Zambia relations and continue to Reach a new level.

;

;Xi Jinping emphasized that China supports Zambia in safeguarding national sovereignty, security, and development interests and exploring a development path that is consistent with its own reality. China is willing to work with Zambia to strengthen inter-party exchanges and exchanges of experience in state governance, and when it comes to each other's core interests and firmly support each other on issues of major concern. The success of Chinese-style modernization demonstrates the diversity of modernization models in the world. China's high-quality development and modernization process will continue to bring new opportunities to countries around the world, including Zambia. China is willing to work with Zambia, guided by the Belt and Road Initiative, to expand cooperation in infrastructure construction, agriculture, mining, clean energy and other fields to jointly achieve development and revitalization. China encourages more high-quality Zambian products to enter the Chinese market and supports more Chinese-funded companies to invest and start business in Zambia. The two sides should successfully hold the celebrations for the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the two countries next year, strengthen exchanges and cooperation in education and training, health care, culture and tourism and other fields, further intensify personnel exchanges, and enhance mutual understanding and mutual understanding between the two peoples.

;

;Xi Jinping pointed out that currently, the collective rise of developing countries and their increasing international influence have become an irreversible trend of the times. We must strengthen solidarity and cooperation, practice true multilateralism, firmly safeguard international fairness and justice, strive to enhance the voice of developing countries, and safeguard the common interests of the two countries and the vast number of developing countries. China-Africa cooperation has become a leader in South-South cooperation and international cooperation with Africa. Sincerity, equality, mutual benefit and win-win, defense of justice, openness and inclusiveness are the main lines and background of China-Africa friendship that have never changed. China firmly supports African countries in pursuing independent development paths and in becoming an important pole in the development of world politics, economy and civilization. China is willing to work with African countries, including Zambia, to implement the outcomes of the China-Africa Leaders’ Dialogue such as the Initiative to Support African Industrialization, strengthen strategic alignment, deepen cooperation in various fields, and support African countries in continuously improving their independent development capabilities and achieving economic recovery. and sustainable development, and work together to build a China-Africa community with a shared future in the new era.

;

;Hichilema said that Zambia cherishes the friendship between Zambia and China forged by the older generation of leaders of the two countries. China's development has driven the progress of countries in the Global South, enhanced their representation and voice in international affairs, and pushed the international order to develop in a more just and reasonable direction. Zambia thanks China for supporting the African Union in joining the G20, and thanks China for its positive role in resolving Zambia's debt problem. Zambia adheres to the one-China principle, highly appreciates the guiding concepts and principles of Chinese-style modernization, hopes to learn from China's development experience, and is willing to work with China to take the opportunity of the establishment of a comprehensive strategic cooperative partnership between the two countries to deepen the joint construction of the "Belt and Road" and Cooperation in mining, agriculture, economy and trade, science and technology, infrastructure construction, medical and health and other fields to achieve complementary advantages and common development. The Forum on China-Africa Cooperation is an important platform to promote the development of African countries. Zambia thanks China for hosting the forum meeting in 2024 and is willing to work with China to promote Africa-China cooperation to a new level, jointly respond to global challenges such as energy and food security, and contribute to the Injecting more stability into the world.

;

;After the talks, the two heads of state jointly witnessed the signing of a number of bilateral cooperation documents in the fields of jointly building the "Belt and Road", green development, digital economy, investment cooperation, inspection and quarantine.

;

;The two sides issued the "Joint Statement between the People's Republic of China and the Republic of Zambia on the Establishment of a Comprehensive Strategic Cooperative Partnership."

;

;Before the talks, Xi Jinping held a welcome ceremony for Hichilema at the square outside the east gate of the Great Hall of the People.

;

;When Hichilema arrived, soldiers of honor lined up to pay tribute. The two heads of state ascended the reviewing stand, the military band played the national anthems of China and Zambia, and a 21-gun salute was fired in Tiananmen Square. Accompanied by Xi Jinping, Hichilema inspected the honor guard of the Chinese People's Liberation Army and watched the procession.

;

;Xi Jinping’s wife Peng Liyuan and Hichilema’s wife Mutinta accompanied him at the welcome ceremony. At noon that day, Xi Jinping and Peng Liyuan held a welcome banquet for Hichilema and Mutinta at the Golden Hall of the Great Hall of the People.

;

;Wang Yi participated in the above activities.

;; Sat, 16 Sep 2023 05:56:04 +0800 01版要闻 - 扎实推动教育强国建设http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-09/16/nw.D110000renmrb_20230916_2-01.htm
;Saturday, September 16, 2023
; ;

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, September 15th  The 18th issue of "Qiushi" published on September 16th The magazine will publish an important article by Xi Jinping, General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, President of the State, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission, "Solidly Promote the Construction of an Educational Power."

;

;The article emphasizes that when education prospers, the country will prosper, and when education is strong, the country will be strong. Building a strong country in education is the strategic forerunner to comprehensively build a modern and powerful socialist country. It is an important support for achieving self-reliance and self-reliance in high-level science and technology. It is an effective way to promote the common prosperity of all people. It is a basic project for comprehensively promoting the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation through Chinese-style modernization. .

;

;The article pointed out that since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, the Party Central Committee has insisted on taking education as a major plan for the country and the Party, making major decisions to accelerate the modernization of education and building an educational power, and promote the historic achievements of education in the new era. Achievements and pattern changes occurred. Our country has built the world's largest education system, and the overall level of educational modernization has entered the ranks of the world's middle and upper countries. This fully proves that the development path of socialist education with Chinese characteristics is completely correct. The report of the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China arranged the layout of educational scientific and technological talents in a separate chapter, sounding the clarion call to accelerate the construction of an educational power. The education power we want to build is a socialist education power with Chinese characteristics. We must adhere to the party's overall leadership of education as the fundamental guarantee, cultivate people with moral integrity as the fundamental task, educate people for the party and educate talents for the country as the fundamental goal, and take Serving the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation is an important mission, taking the modernization of educational concepts, systems, systems, content, methods, and governance as the basic path, supporting and leading Chinese-style modernization as the core function, and ultimately providing education that satisfies the people.

;

;The article points out that we must fully implement the party’s educational policy, adhere to the people-centered development of education, proactively plan ahead, effectively respond to changes, strive to open up new situations, accelerate the modernization of education, and use the power of education to cultivate The foundation of people's happiness, the strength of education lays a solid foundation for the country's prosperity, and provides strong support for comprehensively promoting the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation. First, cultivate new people of the era who will take on the responsibility of national rejuvenation. What kind of people to train, how to train them, and for whom to train are the fundamental issues of education, and they are also the core issues of building a powerful country in education. Our purpose in building a powerful country in education is to cultivate generations of socialist builders and successors who are fully developed morally, intellectually, physically, aesthetically and physically, and to cultivate generation after generation of pillar talents who are useful and able to shoulder important responsibilities in the socialist modernization drive. , to ensure that there are successors to the party's cause and the construction of a modern and powerful socialist country. Second, speed up the construction of a high-quality education system. We must insist on taking high-quality development as the lifeline of all types of education at all levels, accelerate the construction of a high-quality education system, and empower sustainable economic and social development with high-quality education development. Third, comprehensively improve the ability of high-quality development of educational services. Serving high-quality development must be regarded as an important task in building an educational power. Building a country with strong education, science and technology, and talent are inherently consistent and mutually supportive. The three must be organically combined and promoted in an integrated manner to form a multiplier effect that promotes high-quality development. Fourth, stimulate the vitality of educational development while deepening reform and innovation. From a big country in education to a powerful country in education is a systematic leap and qualitative change, which must be driven by reform and innovation. Fifth, enhance the international influence of our country’s education. It is necessary to improve the strategic strategy of education opening to the outside world, coordinate the two major articles of "bringing in" and "going out", effectively utilize world-class educational resources and innovative elements, and make our country an important world education center with strong influence. Sixth, cultivate a team of high-quality teachers. It is necessary to strengthen the construction of the teacher team as the most important basic work in building an educational power, improve the teacher education system with Chinese characteristics, and vigorously cultivate a team of high-quality professional teachers with noble ethics, professional proficiency, reasonable structure, and full of vitality.

;

;The article emphasizes that building a powerful country in education is the common task of the whole party and the whole society. It is necessary to uphold and strengthen the party's overall leadership over education work, and continuously improve the education leadership system in which the party committee leads the unified leadership, the party and the government work together to manage, and each department assumes its own responsibilities. We must strengthen our confidence, work hard over a long period of time, and work together to achieve the goal of building a powerful country through education at an early date.

;; Sat, 16 Sep 2023 05:56:04 +0800 01版要闻 - 习近平会见柬埔寨首相洪玛奈http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-09/16/nw.D110000renmrb_20230916_3-01.htm
;Saturday, September 16, 2023
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;On the morning of September 15th, President Xi Jinping met at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing with Cambodian Prime Minister Hun Manai who was in China for an official visit.
;Photo by Xinhua News Agency reporter Huang Jingwen

;
; ;

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, September 15th  ; (Reporter Zheng Mingda) On the morning of September 15, President Xi Jinping met at the Great Hall of the People with Cambodian Prime Minister Hun Manai who was in China for an official visit.

;

;Xi Jinping pointed out that Prime Minister Hun Manai chose China as the first country to conduct a bilateral visit after taking office, which fully reflects the importance that the new Cambodian government attaches to consolidating and developing China-Cambodia friendship. China and Cambodia are firm friends. Since the establishment of diplomatic relations 65 years ago, the two sides have always had a high degree of mutual trust, equal treatment, mutual benefit and win-win, and have always firmly supported each other in safeguarding national sovereignty, security and development interests. This is the core essence of the China-Cambodia community with a shared future. This year, both sides have opened a new era of building a high-quality, high-level and high-standard China-Cambodia community with a shared future. China is willing to work with Cambodia to promote the construction of a China-Cambodia community with a shared future in depth and concreteness, and work together to create a model for building a community with a shared future for mankind.

;

;Xi Jinping emphasized that China firmly supports Cambodia in exploring a development path that suits its national conditions and is willing to maintain regular strategic communication with Cambodia and deepen the exchange of experience in state governance. Both sides should give full play to the role of the Intergovernmental Coordination Committee mechanism, implement the new version of the China-Cambodia Community of Shared Future Action Plan, enrich the China-Cambodia "Diamond Six" cooperation structure, jointly build the "Industrial Development Corridor" and the "Fish and Rice Corridor", and promote relevant key cooperation Things come to fruition as soon as possible. China is willing to carry out regular law enforcement and security cooperation with Cambodia and continue to crack down on cross-border crimes such as online gambling and telecommunications fraud. Both sides should continue to successfully organize the "China-Cambodia Friendship Year" series of activities, expand cooperation between the two countries in youth, local areas, education, tourism, medical and health and other fields, so that China-Cambodia friendship can bring more benefits to the two peoples.

;

;Xi Jinping pointed out that no matter how the international and regional situation changes, China has always been Cambodia's most reliable friend and its strongest support. China is willing to join hands with Cambodia to jointly safeguard international fairness and justice and safeguard the legitimate rights and interests of developing countries.

;

;Hun Manai said that I made China the first country to officially visit to show that the new Cambodian government will continue to firmly pursue friendly policies towards China and further carry forward the iron-clad friendship between Cambodia and China. Cambodia adheres to the one-China principle, firmly supports China in safeguarding its core interests, and supports the global development initiative, global security initiative, and global civilization initiative proposed by President Xi Jinping. Cambodia thanks China for its long-term strong support and assistance to Cambodia’s economic and social development, and is willing to work with China to implement the important consensus reached by the leaders of the two countries, deepen cooperation in jointly building the “Belt and Road”, and promote the two countries under the “Diamond Six” framework. We will further develop cooperation in the fields of industry, agriculture, investment, people-to-people and cultural exchanges, and build a community of shared future between Cambodia and China to better benefit the two peoples. Cambodia is willing to cooperate closely with China in regional and international affairs to push Cambodia-China relations to a new height.

;

;Wang Yi attended the meeting.

;; Sat, 16 Sep 2023 05:56:04 +0800 01版要闻 - 习近平向第六届海峡两岸青年发展论坛致贺信http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-09/16/nw.D110000renmrb_20230916_4-01.htm
;Saturday, September 16, 2023
; ;

;Congratulatory letter

;

;On the occasion of the opening of the 6th Cross-Strait Youth Development Forum On this occasion, I would like to express my warm congratulations on the hosting of the forum and extend my sincere greetings to the young people on both sides of the Taiwan Strait and all friends participating in the forum!

;

;Youth are the hope of the country and the future of the nation. The Cross-Strait Youth Development Forum provides an important platform for cross-Strait youth to communicate and learn from each other. It is hoped that more young people from both sides of the Taiwan Strait will become good friends and partners who work together and work together through the forum, and continue to contribute their youthful strength to promoting the peaceful development of cross-Strait relations and promoting the great cause of the reunification of the motherland.

;

;To realize the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation is the long-cherished wish of all Chinese people. Young people on both sides of the Taiwan Strait are born at the right time. The stage for them to display their talents is extremely broad and the prospects for realizing their dreams are extremely bright. We welcome young people from Taiwan to come to the mainland to pursue, build and realize their dreams. We hope that young people on both sides of the Taiwan Strait will grasp the general trend of history, uphold national justice, safeguard national unity, bravely shoulder the important responsibilities of the times, firmly follow the correct path of peaceful development of cross-Strait relations, and firmly hold the future and destiny of the development of cross-Strait relations in the hands of the Chinese people on both sides.

;

;Xi Jinping    

;

;September 15, 2023  

;

; (Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, September 15)  

;

;

;

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, September 15th  General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee and President Xi Jinping sent a congratulatory letter to the Sixth Cross-Strait Youth Development Forum on the 15th.

;

;Xi Jinping pointed out that young people are the hope of the country and the future of the nation. The Cross-Strait Youth Development Forum provides an important platform for cross-Strait youth to communicate and learn from each other. It is hoped that more young people from both sides of the Taiwan Strait will become good friends and partners who work together and work together through the forum, and continue to contribute their youthful strength to promoting the peaceful development of cross-Strait relations and promoting the great cause of the reunification of the motherland.

;

;Xi Jinping emphasized that realizing the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation is the common long-cherished wish of all Chinese people. Young people on both sides of the Taiwan Strait are born at the right time. The stage for them to display their talents is extremely broad and the prospects for realizing their dreams are extremely bright. We welcome young people from Taiwan to come to the mainland to pursue, build and realize their dreams. We hope that young people on both sides of the Taiwan Strait will grasp the general trend of history, uphold national justice, safeguard national unity, bravely shoulder the important responsibilities of the times, firmly follow the correct path of peaceful development of cross-Strait relations, and firmly hold the future and destiny of the development of cross-Strait relations in the hands of the Chinese people on both sides. (The full text of the congratulatory letter will be issued separately)

;

;The 6th Cross-Strait Youth Development Forum, with the theme of "Working together to welcome the Asian Games and drawing a new blueprint together," held the opening ceremony and main forum of the forum in Hangzhou, Zhejiang on the 15th.

;; Sat, 16 Sep 2023 05:56:04 +0800 01版要闻 - 习近平向中欧班列国际合作论坛致贺信http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-09/16/nw.D110000renmrb_20230916_5-01.htm
;Saturday, September 16, 2023
; ;

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, September 15th  The Cooperation Forum sent a congratulatory letter.

;

;Xi Jinping pointed out that since the launch of the China-Europe freight trains, it has maintained safe, stable and smooth operation, created a new pattern of international transportation between Asia and Europe, built a new platform for economic and trade cooperation along the route, effectively guaranteed the stability of the international industrial chain and supply chain, and provided a solid foundation for the Injecting new impetus into world economic development. China will continue to work with all parties to uphold the Silk Road spirit of peace and cooperation, openness and inclusiveness, mutual learning, mutual benefit and win-win, adhere to the principle of extensive consultation, joint contribution and shared benefits, and promote China-Europe freight trains towards higher quality, better efficiency, and higher efficiency. Develop in a safer direction and make new and greater contributions to promoting global economic development, improving the well-being of people in all countries, and promoting the building of a community with a shared future for mankind.

;

;The theme of the China-Europe International Cooperation Forum is "Deepening Connectivity   Promoting Win-Win Cooperation". It is jointly organized by the National Development and Reform Commission, the Ministry of Transport, the General Administration of Customs, the National Railway Group, Jiangsu and Inner Mongolia , Heilongjiang, Henan, Chongqing, Sichuan, Shaanxi, Xinjiang and other provincial and municipal people's governments co-sponsored the same day in Lianyungang City, Jiangsu Province.

;; Sat, 16 Sep 2023 05:56:04 +0800 01版要闻 - 8月份国民经济延续恢复态势（新数据 新看点）http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-09/16/nw.D110000renmrb_20230916_6-01.htm
;Saturday, September 16, 2023
; ;

;This newspaper, Beijing, September 15th  (Reporter Liu Zhiqiang) On the 15th, the National Bureau of Statistics released the August The operation of the national economy. In August, under the influence of a series of policy measures to expand domestic demand, boost confidence, and prevent risks, industrial and service industry production accelerated, domestic demand continued to expand, the employment and price situation improved, positive factors accumulated, and the national economy continued to recover. The quality of development has steadily improved.

;

;The growth of production and supply is accelerating. In August, the added value of industries above designated size increased by 4.5% year-on-year, and the growth rate accelerated by 0.8 percentage points from the previous month. Among them, the added value of the equipment manufacturing industry increased by 5.4% year-on-year, and the growth rate accelerated by 2.1 percentage points from the previous month. While the growth rate of industrial production is picking up, the service industry is growing well. In August, the service industry production index increased by 6.8% year-on-year, and the growth rate accelerated by 1.1 percentage points from the previous month.

;

;Domestic demand is expanding steadily. Market sales are recovering at an accelerated pace. In August, the total retail sales of consumer goods increased by 4.6% year-on-year, and the growth rate accelerated by 2.1 percentage points from the previous month. Service retail sales maintained rapid growth. From January to August, service retail sales increased by 19.4% year-on-year.

;

;(See the fourth page for relevant reports)

;; Sat, 16 Sep 2023 05:56:04 +0800 02版要闻 - 为世界经济发展注入新动力http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-09/16/nw.D110000renmrb_20230916_1-02.htm
;Saturday, September 16, 2023
; ;

; "To make new and greater contributions to promoting global economic development, enhancing the well-being of people of all countries, and promoting the construction of a community with a shared future for mankind." On September 15, President Xi Jinping sent a congratulatory letter to the China-Europe Railway Express International Cooperation Forum, which aroused enthusiastic responses inside and outside the venue. Everyone said that President Xi Jinping’s congratulatory letter clarified the important role of China-Europe freight trains in world economic development, pointed out the direction for further promoting the high-quality development of China-Europe freight trains, and gathered the strength of all parties for cooperation and development.

;

;The China-Europe freight train is an iconic brand in the joint construction of the “Belt and Road”. In the past 10 years, a total of 77,000 China-Europe freight trains have been operated, reaching 217 cities in 25 European countries, creating a new pattern of international transportation between Asia and Europe and building a new platform for economic and trade cooperation along the route.

;

;“We are very excited that President Xi Jinping emphasized the importance of China-Europe freight trains in ensuring the stability of the international industrial and supply chains.” Han Boling, director of the freight department of China Railway Group, said that currently, China’s freight to Europe The categories of goods have expanded to 53 categories and more than 50,000 commodities, including complete automobiles and machinery and equipment. The categories of goods shipped from Europe to China have also gradually expanded to include mechanical and electrical products, food, medical equipment and other commodities. The total value of the goods transported has exceeded 3,400. billion, effectively promoting China-EU economic and trade cooperation, and also driving economic development and improvement of people's livelihood in countries and regions along the route.

;

;After listening to President Xi Jinping’s congratulatory message on the spot, Dusan Nawuhan, the business manager of the Kazakhstan Railway Beijing Representative Office, felt deeply: “In recent years, construction materials shipped from China to Kazakhstan through China-Europe trains , machinery and equipment, etc., Kazakhstan’s agricultural and sideline products and mineral resources can also be transported more quickly to China and other parts of the world, which has effectively promoted the development of Kazakhstan.”

;

;Ruiya Logistics is a company engaged in Gustaw Chojnowski, manager of the Chengdu branch of a Polish company that transports goods between China and Europe, said: "The China-Europe freight trains have shortened the time for Chinese products to be shipped to Europe and increased the export of goods from Europe to Asia. The company hopes to find more people willing to cooperate. China's freight forwarding company continues to expand the economic and trade channels between China and Europe."

;

;"Under the framework of jointly building the 'Belt and Road', China-Europe freight trains have greatly promoted free trade and benefited the diversification of global logistics hubs. It is a new type of global public good that enhances multilateral win-win and contributes real strength to building a community with a shared future for mankind." Singaporean political commentator Ong Desheng said that President Xi Jinping's congratulatory letter has high aspirations, clarifies the global significance of China-Europe freight trains, and enhances the This has enhanced the confidence of all parties in promoting the high-quality development of China-Europe freight trains.

;

;Facing the future, everyone expressed that they will continue to move forward hand in hand and jointly build the China-Europe Railway Express into a "road to happiness" that benefits people of all countries and a "road to prosperity" that benefits the world.

;

;"President Xi Jinping proposed in his congratulatory letter that we adhere to the principle of extensive consultation, joint contribution and shared benefits, which provides us with key guidance for the next step." Liu Bin, deputy general manager of Jiangsu International Freight Train Co., Ltd., said that the To better meet the needs of industry and the development needs of export-oriented enterprises, efforts should be made to promote the construction of overseas goods soliciting system and help promote enterprises to "go out" and "bring in".

;

;“President Xi Jinping’s congratulatory letter points out the direction for us to further promote the development of China-Europe freight trains in the direction of higher quality, better efficiency, and greater safety.” Liu, General Manager of Yuxinou (Chongqing) Logistics Co., Ltd. Taiping said that we will work hard to accelerate the expansion and quality improvement of China-Europe freight trains, actively explore new routes, build distribution hubs, serve industry development, expand the comprehensive functions of China-Europe freight trains, ensure the stability and smoothness of key industrial and supply chains, and prepare for full integration into the joint construction of " "One Belt, One Road" and the New Western Land-Sea Corridor will make greater contributions.

;

; "Currently, the high value-added and high-tech products transported through the 'Yi-Xin-Europe' China-Europe freight trains are showing a growing trend." Yiwu Tianmeng Industrial Investment Co., Ltd., the operator of the "Yi-Xin-Europe" China-Europe freight trains Feng Xubin, chairman of the company, said that in the future, the company will further improve its organizational service capabilities and digitally empower operations, accelerate the "going global" layout through cooperative construction of overseas hubs and distribution centers, and improve the high-quality development level of China-Europe trains.

;

;Horgos is an important port for the China-Europe Railway Express. Mao Ronggang, Secretary of the Party Committee and Commissioner of Horgos Customs, said that all customs personnel will give full play to the advantages of reforms such as the "Railway Express" model, support the implementation of the "standard gauge to broad gauge" project, and actively cooperate with the customs, railways, and Border inspections and enterprises coordinate and link up, strengthen follow-up supervision and monitor the operation status of trains, and go all out to ensure the "big in and out" of cross-border logistics channels.

;

;“President Xi Jinping’s congratulatory letter points out the direction and provides fundamental guidance for further consolidating and improving the high-quality development level of China-Europe freight trains and deepening mutually beneficial cooperation between China and countries along the route.” Director of the Regional Opening Department of the National Development and Reform Commission Xu Jianping said that we will further improve the layout of the China-Europe train assembly center. Together with the countries along the China-Europe Railway Express, we will accelerate the improvement of the inter-governmental cooperation mechanism, coordinate and solve the problems of infrastructure congestion at ports, channels and other along the route, and ensure the smooth and efficient operation of the China-Europe Railway Express. Establish and improve the multimodal transport system of China-Europe trains, deepen safety management along the route, and jointly create a better international environment for the stable and long-term operation of China-Europe trains.

;

;(Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, September 15th  Xinhua News Agency reporter)

;; Sat, 16 Sep 2023 05:56:04 +0800 02版要闻 - 中华人民共和国和赞比亚共和国关于建立全面战略合作伙伴关系的联合声明http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-09/16/nw.D110000renmrb_20230916_2-02.htm
;Saturday, September 16, 2023
; ;

;At the invitation of President Xi Jinping of the People’s Republic of China, Hakainde Hichilema, President of the Republic of Zambia, on September 10, 2023 He will pay a state visit to the People's Republic of China from September 16th to 16th.

;

;During the visit, the two heads of state held talks in a cordial and friendly atmosphere, exchanged in-depth views on China-Zambia, China-Africa relations, and international and regional issues of common interest, and reached broad and important consensus. Li Qiang, Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, and Zhao Leji, Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress, met with President Hichilema respectively.

;

;The two heads of state cherished the all-weather friendship personally forged by the older generation leaders of the two countries, and spoke highly of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the two countries, especially the close cooperation in politics, economy and other fields since the two countries entered the new era. The two heads of state decided to upgrade their relationship to a comprehensive strategic cooperative partnership.

;

;1. On working together to build a community with a shared future for mankind

;

;China and Zambia support each other in international affairs, set an example in safeguarding the common interests of developing countries and international fairness and justice, and contribute to the maintenance of regional and Make positive contributions to world peace and development.

;

;(1) Both sides reaffirm their commitment to true multilateralism, defend the international system with the United Nations at its core, the international order based on international law, and the basic norms of international relations based on the purposes and principles of the United Nations Charter, and safeguard The international community unites and cooperates to promote the common values ​​of peace, development, fairness, justice, democracy, and freedom for all mankind, and promote the construction of a community with a shared future for mankind.

;

;(2) Both sides reaffirmed their support for the authority of the United Nations, agreed on the need to reform the United Nations and the Security Council to enable developing countries to play a greater role, supported the expansion of Africa’s representation and voice in the Security Council, and corrected the suffered historical injustice. Zambia reiterated the importance of the "Ezulwini Consensus" and thanked China for being the first country in the G20 to support the African Union's accession to the G20.

;

;(3) Both sides agreed that they must proceed from their own country’s reality and explore a democratic path that meets the needs of their people.

;

;(4) Both sides agreed that the development of human rights is a common cause for all mankind. All countries must adhere to the basic human rights with the right to survival and development as the first priority. The human rights development path of each country must be based on the national conditions and people of each country. Human rights exchanges and cooperation should be carried out on the basis of mutual respect and equal treatment.

;

;(5) Both sides agreed that climate change is a challenge facing all mankind and requires joint efforts by the international community to address it. Developed countries have an unshirkable historical responsibility for climate change and should take the lead in undertaking substantial emission reduction obligations and earnestly fulfill their commitments to provide financial, technological and capacity-building support to developing countries.

;

; (6) Zambia thanks China for its key role in the resolution of Zambia’s debt as co-chairman of the Zambia Creditors Committee under the common framework of the G20, and appreciates China’s unremitting efforts to promote the sustainable solution of Zambia’s debt problem effort.

;

;(7) Both sides spoke highly of the important role of the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation in promoting China-Africa comprehensive strategic cooperative partnership, and agreed to strengthen consultation and coordination on the affairs of the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation and jointly implement the Dakar Action Practical cooperation in various fields within the framework of the "Plan (2022-2024)".

;

;2. Deepen high-quality cooperation in jointly building the “Belt and Road”

;

; (8) The "Government of the People's Republic of China and the Government of the Republic of Zambia on Jointly Promoting the Silk Road" will be signed in 2018. On the basis of the Memorandum of Understanding on the Construction of the Belt and Road Economic Belt and the 21st Century Maritime Silk Road, we will deepen high-quality cooperation in jointly building the "Belt and Road", promote practical cooperation in related fields to achieve more fruitful results, and jointly safeguard the safety of cooperation projects and corporate personnel of both parties. Zambia speaks highly of the positive role that the "Belt and Road" initiative has played in promoting the economic development and improvement of people's livelihood in the joint construction of countries over the past ten years. It wishes the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum a complete success and is willing to step up efforts to implement Zambia's "Belt and Road Initiative". The Eight National Development Plans are aligned with the Belt and Road Initiative to promote win-win cooperation and common development.

;

; (9) The two parties will establish a strategic partnership for green development, strengthen cooperation in the fields of environmental protection, climate change response, green economy, risk emergency mechanism construction and other fields, and deepen mutual benefits in photovoltaic and other renewable energy and electric vehicle-related industries. Cooperate to promote energy transformation and ensure energy security. Zambia appreciates China's efforts, determination and actions to adhere to green and low-carbon development and actively participate in international cooperation to address climate change, and will take this opportunity to promote relevant cooperation between the two sides.

;

;(10) The two parties will strengthen mutually beneficial cooperation in the fields of mineral exploration and mining and industrial value-added. Zambia invites Chinese mining companies to continue to actively participate in mining cooperation. China encourages Chinese enterprises to participate in investment in Zambia's new energy battery value chain development projects, and supports Zambia's industrial chain upgrading and improvement of independent development capabilities.

;

;(11) At the request of Zambia, China is willing to support the upgrading and transformation of the Tanzania-Zambia Railway in accordance with the principles of marketization and commercialization.

;

;(12) Both sides welcome Chinese enterprises to participate in infrastructure construction cooperation through various forms such as government and social capital cooperation.

;

;3. Regarding the implementation of global development initiatives

;

;China and Zambia are active and important forces in maintaining international peace and development. The two sides' taking the lead in implementing global development initiatives is a concrete measure to strengthen bilateral relations.

;

;(13) Zambia once again warmly congratulates the successful convening of the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, and warmly congratulates President Xi Jinping on his re-election as General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission. He spoke highly of China's great achievements in the past ten years in the new era, and believed that Chinese-style modernization has created a new form of human civilization and provided new options for the vast number of developing countries to independently move towards modernization and explore the diversity of modernization paths. Zambia is willing to learn from China’s successful experience in Chinese-style modernization and fully believes that under the leadership of the Communist Party of China, China will fully build a modern and powerful socialist country, achieve its second centenary goal, and comprehensively promote the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation with Chinese-style modernization.

;

;(14) China highly appreciates Zambia's long-term political stability and peaceful and friendly relations with other countries in the same region, and positively evaluates Zambia's achievements in developing the economy and improving people's livelihood under the leadership of President Hichilema. Achievement. China believes that under the leadership of President Hichilema, Zambia will fully implement the Eighth National Development Plan and achieve economic transformation, and the Zambian people's lives will be better. President Hichilema will play a greater role in safeguarding regional and world peace and development. positive effects. President Xi Jinping congratulated and supported President Hichilema on taking over the rotating chairmanship of the Common Market for Eastern and Southern Africa and the rotating chairmanship of the political, defense and security body of the Southern African Development Community.

;

;(15) China reiterates its firm support for the Zambian people to independently choose a development path that suits their national conditions, and firmly supports Zambia in safeguarding national independence, sovereignty, security and development interests. Zambia reaffirms its firm commitment to the one-China principle. The government of the People's Republic of China is the only legal government representing the whole of China. Taiwan is an inalienable part of China's territory. Zambia firmly supports the Chinese government's efforts to achieve national reunification. Zambia supports China's legitimate measures to safeguard the prosperity and stability of Xinjiang, Tibet and Hong Kong, believes in China's ability to safeguard national sovereignty and security, and opposes any words and deeds that undermine China's sovereignty and territorial integrity.

;

;(16) Zambia appreciates President Xi Jinping’s global development initiative, leading countries to put development issues back at the core of international issues, and promoting the accelerated implementation of the United Nations 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development. China welcomes Zambia to officially join the "Group of Friends of the Global Development Initiative". The two sides will promote practical cooperation in various fields under the framework of the Global Development Initiative.

;

;(17) Both sides believe that the celebration of the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the two countries and the 60th anniversary of Zambia’s independence in 2024 should be used as an opportunity to further give play to the political leadership role of heads of state diplomacy, maintain the momentum of high-level exchanges and dialogue, and enhance political mutual trust , to consolidate the political foundation of bilateral relations. Both sides emphasized that "mutual respect, equal treatment, and common development" are important principles for China-Zambia relations.

;

;Both sides agreed that strengthening practical cooperation and closer economic ties between China and Zambia is in the fundamental interests of the two peoples. Both sides agreed to designate 2024 as the China-Zambia Economic and Trade Year.

;

;(18) The two sides will strengthen trade cooperation. China will invite Zambia to continue to participate in the China International Import Expo, actively study giving Zambia more market access for specialty commodities, and provide convenience for Zambia to hold trade promotion activities in China. Zambia thanks China for the invitation and appreciates China's series of major measures to open up to the outside world at a high level. China supports the construction of the African Continental Free Trade Area.

;

;(19) The two sides will strengthen investment cooperation. The two sides agreed to establish an investment cooperation working group mechanism to promote investment cooperation in areas such as digital economy and green development. China encourages more Chinese companies to invest and cooperate in Zambia's manufacturing industry, create more jobs and fulfill social responsibilities. Zambia will further improve the business environment by establishing a "one-stop" platform and provide convenience for Chinese companies to invest and operate in Zambia. The two sides will strengthen the construction of economic and trade cooperation zones and support the upgrading of Zambia's economic and trade cooperation zones into industrial and supply chain cooperation demonstration zones. China supports Zambia in attracting investment in the Huawei park.

;

;(20) The two sides will implement the "Joint Statement between the People's Republic of China and the Republic of Zambia on Deepening Agricultural Cooperation and Ensuring Food Security."赞方将为中国企业在赞比亚进行农业投资提供必要支持。中方鼓励中国企业在赞比亚开展农产品全产业链合作及投资化肥、农药、农机等生产。

;

;（二十一）双方鼓励在贸易和投资中更多使用本币结算，便利两国企业减少汇兑成本、降低汇率风险。双方还将为推动本币结算创造良好的政策环境，支持在赞人民币清算行发挥更大作用。

;

;（二十二）双方认识到，重新激活的穆隆古希纺织厂将采用现代高效技术，符合赞比亚政府的工业化发展战略，促进农产品加工和对华出口增值，从而创造就业、减轻贫困，特别是在从事棉花种植的农村社区。中方鼓励有实力的中国企业按照市场化原则积极推进相关工作。

;

;四、关于落实全球安全倡议

;

;赞方支持习近平主席提出全球安全倡议，中赞愿共同落实全球安全倡议，为推动世界持久和平与发展作出贡献。

;

;（二十三）双方赞赏对方在维护地区和世界和平稳定方面作出的积极贡献。双方一致同意，各国应坚持共同、综合、合作、可持续的安全观，坚持尊重各国主权、领土完整，坚持遵守联合国宪章宗旨和原则，坚持重视各国合理安全关切，坚持通过对话以和平方式解决国家间的分歧和争端，坚持统筹维护传统领域和非传统领域安全。

;

;（二十四）双方承诺保护本国境内对方公民及机构的安全和合法权益。

;

;（二十五）双方将进一步加强和平与安全领域的交流与合作，密切两国军方高层交往，加强在人员培训、打击跨国犯罪、军事医学、装备技术等领域合作。中国将继续向赞比亚派遣军事医疗专家组。

;

;（二十六）赞方赞赏中方提出的《关于政治解决乌克兰危机的中国立场》。中方赞赏希奇莱马总统同其他非洲国家领导人组成和平代表团访问俄罗斯和乌克兰，并提出“非洲和平倡议”。双方一致认为，对话谈判是唯一可行出路，一切有利于和平解决危机的努力都应得到鼓励和支持。双方呼吁国际社会合作应对危机在粮食、能源、金融、交通等领域造成的外溢效应，减少对广大发展中国家特别是非洲国家的负面影响，呼吁更多国家为推动危机和平解决发挥建设性作用。

;

;（二十七）双方支持在应对气候变化、供应链产业链稳定畅通等领域合作，避免将能源和粮食安全问题政治化、武器化，维护能源和粮食供应畅通、价格稳定。

;

;五、关于落实全球文明倡议

;

;双方认识到，世界各国在求和平、谋发展、探索现代化道路过程中面临共同挑战，需要团结、协作、对话，但分裂和对抗仍在阻碍国际团结合作。为此，中赞应率先落实全球文明倡议，加强文明交流、促进民心相通。

;

;（二十八）两国执政党将在独立自主、完全平等、互相尊重、互不干涉内部事务原则基础上加强党际交往合作，开展党的建设、治国理政经验交流等活动。

;

;（二十九）赞方支持习近平主席提出全球文明倡议。双方高度评价两国在文化、旅游、教育、公共卫生、青年、智库、媒体、体育等领域合作成果，同意加强上述领域合作。双方将于2024年举办中赞文化和旅游年。

;

;（三十）中方赞赏赞方对访赞中国游客实施免签证待遇。赞方感谢中方将赞比亚列为中国旅行社出境团队旅游第二批试点国家，欢迎中国公民赴赞旅游。双方同意提高人员往来便利化水平。

;

;（三十一）双方将加强卫生领域合作。中方将继续支持赞比亚公共卫生系统建设，并继续向赞比亚派遣医疗队。赞方感谢中国对赞比亚卫生健康领域特别是在新冠疫情期间的持续支持。

;

;（三十二）双方期待早日开通两国直飞航班，进一步促进人员往来。

;

;双方一致认为，希奇莱马总统访华取得圆满成功，对促进中赞关系发展及推动构建高水平中非命运共同体具有重大意义。希奇莱马总统对习近平主席及中国政府和人民在访问期间给予的热情友好接待表示衷心感谢。希奇莱马总统邀请习近平主席于2024年两国建交60周年之际访问赞比亚。

;

;（新华社北京9月15日电）

;; Sat, 16 Sep 2023 05:56:04 +0800 02版要闻 - 雅万高铁助力中印尼关系提质增速（大使随笔）http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-09/16/nw.D110000renmrb_20230916_3-02.htm
;2023年09月16日星期六
; ;

;印度尼西亚首都雅加达至旅游名城万隆的高铁是印尼乃至东南亚的第一条高速铁路，也是中国高铁首次全系统、全要素、全产业链在海外落地，一直受到广泛关注和高度期待。今年7月，习近平主席在成都会见来华出席第三十一届世界大学生夏季运动会开幕式并访华的印尼总统佐科。这是去年7月以来两国元首第三次举行会见或会谈，体现了中印尼关系的高水平和独特性。每次会见或会谈时，雅万高铁都是双方元首交流的重要话题，这充分说明雅万高铁在中印尼友好关系发展中的特殊地位。

;

;每小时350公里，这是近期雅万高铁动车组试运行时达到的速度，也是目前世界高铁商业运行最快速度。雅万高铁开通后，将为印尼人民创造更加便捷的出行方式。过去从雅加达到万隆乘汽车需要3个多小时，今后乘坐高铁可缩短至40分钟，为两地人员往来、物资流通带来极大便利。雅万高铁还为当地提供大量就业岗位，并且通过分享知识和技术，助力印尼培养更多高素质人才。从长远看，雅万高铁建成通车将进一步优化当地投资环境、增加印尼人民就业机会，有力带动沿线商业开发和旅游发展，促进形成新的经济增长点，加快形成高铁经济走廊。雅万高铁将成为印尼人民的发展之路、民生之路、共赢之路。

;

;雅万高铁是中印尼高质量共建“一带一路”的旗舰项目，是两国合作打造的一系列精品工程中的标志性项目。雅万高铁也是见证中印尼友好关系的友谊之路，全面体现了“一带一路”倡议共商共建共享原则。雅万高铁不仅证明中国高铁技术成熟、高效，具有标准国际化和环境适应度高的特点，而且生动体现出高质量共建“一带一路”惠及当地民生，受到共建国家人民的真诚欢迎。雅万高铁将助力中印尼友好关系进一步提质增速，也将进一步坚定广大发展中国家坚持走符合自身国情发展道路的信心。

;

;习近平主席强调，在实现国家现代化和民族复兴道路上，中国和印尼理念高度契合、互为发展机遇，是志同道合的同路人、好伙伴。这为中印尼友好关系未来发展进一步指明了方向。雅万高铁列车将满载印尼人民对更美好生活的向往，飞驰在美丽的爪哇岛上。我们相信雅万高铁将成为助力和见证中印尼友好关系行稳致远的未来之路。中方愿推动深化中印尼更高水平的战略合作，把中印尼命运共同体从宏伟蓝图变为现实，打造发展中大国命运与共、团结合作、携手发展的典范，为地区和世界和平与发展注入更多确定性和正能量。

;

;（作者为中国驻印度尼西亚大使）

; Sat, 16 Sep 2023 05:56:04 +0800 02版要闻 - 中国已与171个国家和地区建立海关检验检疫合作关系http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-09/16/nw.D110000renmrb_20230916_4-02.htm
;2023年09月16日星期六
; ;

;据新华社南宁9月15日电  （记者邹多为、黄耀滕）为了确保人民群众“餐桌上的安全”，海关总署积极参与和促进国际食品安全领域监管合作。截至目前，中国已与171个国家和地区建立海关检验检疫合作关系，签署农产品食品准入类国际合作文件近400份。

;

;这是记者从15日在南宁举行的“一带一路”海关食品安全合作研讨会上获悉的。当前，食品贸易已成为中国与共建“一带一路”国家贸易的新热点，中国海关与共建“一带一路”国家在共同提高食品安全治理水平方面取得积极成果。

;

;据海关统计，今年1至8月，我国对共建“一带一路”国家进出口总值达到12.62万亿元，同比增长3.6%，其中食品贸易达到5538.2亿元，较去年同期增长10.4%，较2013年同期增长162%。

;

;会议通过了“一带一路”海关食品安全合作倡议并签署了合作机制章程。 14名中外与会代表还通过研讨分享保障食品安全、促进贸易发展等方面的经验做法，并针对深化海关检验检疫国际合作、探索各方协同治理等内容提出建设性的意见和建议。

;

;本次研讨会以“保障食品安全，促进贸易发展”为主题，旨在推动共建“一带一路”国家进出口食品安全治理理念共认同、国际规则共完善、全程监管共落实、问题风险共处置，打造共建“一带一路”国家食品安全国际合作共治新平台，100余名国内外政府官员、国际组织代表等与会。

;2023年09月16日星期六

;

;中哈连云港物流合作基地从2014年投用至今，累计发运中欧班列4889列，进出场集装箱181.6万标箱。图为9月15日，在中哈连云港物流合作基地，大批集装箱在等待装车。

;

;耿玉和摄（影像中国）

;; Sat, 16 Sep 2023 05:56:04 +0800
